Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory807.jpg'}
{3: 'On the scoreboard, the symbols for the black "Queen" and "Knight" dim.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'King', 3: 'So, no thoughts of surrendering now?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'I still have pieces in play.', 3: '8', 4: 'Unless you truly "checkmate" me.', 5: '8'}
{2: 'King', 3: 'Are you still pinning your hopes on that pawn?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Her name is Fida.', 3: '10'}
{2: 'King', 3: '...Why are you so desperate to win?', 4: '1'}

{2: 'King', 3: 'Let me guess, perhaps you are driven by a sense of duty to protect your companion, the greed for wanting something from me, the kindness cultivated by sweet nothings of comradeship and bonds?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'King', 3: 'Or is it just a pure competitive spirit?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'There are many reasons.', 3: '16'}
{2: 'King', 3: 'Unfortunately, this game will not satisfy any of those purposes.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'King', 3: 'You\'re trying to find a way back to the so-called "Original World": through me, right?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'King', 3: 'Unexpectedly thrown into a strange event, you find yourself in a place that, well... exuded an air of the "Demon "King"\'s castle"?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'King', 3: "Plus, there's a villain with seemingly evil intentions, and the whole world is on the brink of destruction.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'King', 3: "At this point, all you need to do is gather your companions, reach the final boss's castle, and embark on a thrilling adventure.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'King', 3: 'Utilizing your exceptional wit to turn the tables, your thought-to-be-lost allies revive one after another, everyone hugging each other in joy and relief, and the crisis is neatly resolved.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'King', 3: 'A cause for celebration, or is this the ending you longed for in your tale?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'King', 3: "No matter how insurmountable the difficulty, there's always a solution. Even if the journey is filled with despair and sorrow, the conclusion always brings a slight solace.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'King', 3: "After all, you've weathered many similar storms. Regardless of how outlandish the circumstances, there always seems to be a sensible way out.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'King', 3: 'It\'s a self-consistent logic, or rather, it\'s the principle of "contradiction" at work.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'King', 3: 'In your imagination, defeating me would solve all the contradictions.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'King', 3: 'Am I right?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Have you ever considered becoming a novelist?', 3: '36'}
{2: 'King', 3: "Too bad. I don't believe in such stories.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'King', 3: 'Standing against me is utterly pointless.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'King', 3: 'From the beginning, it was never possible for you all to "return."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'King', 3: "Hmm? You don't seem very surprised.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Were you expecting me to be?', 3: '46'}
{2: 'King', 3: 'Did that self-proclaimed "Craftsman" tell you as much?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alpha, did you know all of this from the very beginning?', 3: '51'}
{1: '1', 2: 'α', 3: 'No... not from the very beginning.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'King', 3: "You're more cunning than I thought, Alpha. If you'd been honest from the beginning, this farce might have ended sooner.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory818.jpg'}
{2: 'King', 3: 'Everything in this Corridor is but a reflection in the mirror.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'King', 3: 'Be it you, Alpha, or Lucia, none came from the "Original World"...'}
{2: 'King', 3: 'You\'ve been here "from the beginning."'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg3002_21.jpg'}
{2: 'King', 3: 'Corridor reflects the "Mental Image".'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg3002_11.jpg'}
{2: 'King', 3: 'You are your thoughts, your emotions, your past, present, and future.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory807.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'King', 3: 'However, a shadow in the mirror can never step outside its surface.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'King', 3: 'This story was never contradictory from the start. Your conflict with me will lead nowhere.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'It will lead nowhere...', 3: '86'}
{3: 'This "game" holds no significance for me, it\'s merely a "game."'}
{2: 'King', 3: 'Do you think I would lie?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'King', 3: 'So, shall we see what unfolds once this game is over?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'King', 3: 'I can even reveal the answer to you in advance—nothing will happen.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'King', 3: "Even if you fancy yourself a dragon-slaying hero, you've picked the wrong castle, 【kuroname】.", 4: '1'}
{2: "Alpha, wasn't your purpose to return?", 3: '93'}
{1: '1', 2: 'α', 3: "What, you're blaming me for not telling you the truth?", 4: '1'}
{2: "You could have been honest with me. It wouldn't have changed anything.", 3: '97'}
{3: 'Accompanied is a soft sigh after a long silence.'}
{2: 'α', 3: 'Would it have influenced your actions?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'It would have affected how I felt about them.', 3: '101'}
{3: 'Alpha chuckles, seemingly having anticipated your reaction.'}
{2: 'α', 3: '...You\'re wrong, you cowardly "King". "Contradictions" do exist.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'α', 3: 'At least, they exist between you and me.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Alpha watches the "King", her stance unchanged regardless of her own thoughts, never wavering from the start.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'α', 3: 'The Mental Image of Corridor labels us "outsiders."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'α', 3: 'That Craftsman said, our presence here is an "error."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'α', 3: 'This mirror of Corridor was never meant to reflect us, so there must be something else serving as the "medium."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'α', 3: 'Luna\'s consciousness... or rather, a shard of it, has indeed "come here."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'α', 3: "It shouldn't stay here; it needs to return where it belongs.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'α', 3: 'You\'re not the real Ascension-Network. Luna is the "mirror," and you\'re just her reflected shadow.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'King', 3: 'So, what do you see through this veil of shadow, Alpha?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'King', 3: "If you truly understand everything, you'll know which side you should pick.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'α', 3: "...The one you've been trying to eliminate has always been the same person.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'α', 3: 'That girl in black will stand in your way no matter what.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory807.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'α', 3: 'You removed me, an uncontrollable factor, from this game to ensure her downfall.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'α', 3: 'Everything was arranged against her, so you said victory or defeat meant nothing to 【kuroname】.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'α', 3: 'If 【kuroname】 really loses, you\'d use Lucia as leverage, forcing 【kuroname】 to abandon that girl as the "King".', 4: '1'}
{2: 'α', 3: "And you know this naive fool won't easily let go of someone they've barely known for a day. That's why you've cleverly staged such a dilemma.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'α', 3: 'Is this your idea of a "game"? It\'s nothing more than a meticulously planned murder.', 4: '1'}

{1: '1', 2: 'King', 3: 'My wish was to create a world without "conflicts". But as long as that girl in black exists, she will breed conflicts, which is inherently incompatible with the "peace" I desire.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'α', 3: 'And where does this wish come from?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'King', 3: "Don't you understand, Alpha?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'King', 3: "You've been through so much with her, and witnessed the same world together.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg3401_15.jpg'}
{2: 'King', 3: 'The essence of conflict lies in mutual hatred, which inevitably leads to mutual destruction.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory807.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'King', 3: "Both of you are victims of malice. Why can't you comprehend such a simple wish?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'King', 3: "If she could remain in this world, one that I've reshaped, she'd never suffer again. She would enjoy eternal stability and warmth.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'King', 3: "As her sister, isn't this what you wanted?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'King', 3: "Aren't you tired of saving the Earth time and time again? Don't you wish to see an end to the constant crises that befall those you hold dear?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'King', 3: "I can offer you the future you've always dreamed of, free from the burdens of your past.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'King', 3: 'In a true "paradise," you\'ll find enduring "happiness."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'King', 3: "This isn't a dream, not a conjecture, nor a negligible possibility.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'King', 3: 'It\'s a "reality" that only "you," who exist here, can experience.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The "King" extends her hand, as if sincerely see"King" reconciliation.'}
{3: 'She wants to create her own Eden in this Corridor where everyone can live happily.'}
{3: 'Under her governance, the Mental Images will cease their conflicts, giving rise to a more advanced civilization.'}
{3: 'All it takes...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Is the sacrifice of one girl.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory807.jpg'}
{3: 'Without any other cost.'}
{3: 'It seems so effortless, so easily attainable.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'King', 3: '...So you made up your mind?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'No matter how many times you ask...', 3: '192'}
{2: 'My answer remains unchanged.', 3: '193'}
{2: 'King', 3: 'Do you... truly comprehend the situation at hand?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'King', 3: "Even if you refuse my proposal, you won't find a new path.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'King', 3: 'Are you worried I might be lying? Do you doubt my ability to fulfill these promises?', 4: '1'}
{2: "I don't think you're lying, nor do I question your capabilities.", 3: '198'}
{2: "I simply reject every single word you're saying.", 3: '199'}
{2: 'King', 3: 'As expected... humans are fundamentally unable to escape their predatory and harmful nature...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'King', 3: "I only need to eliminate one person; I won't take anything from you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'King', 3: 'Even so, you choose to be my "enemy"?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'King', 3: 'Utterly foolish...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Just like she said...', 3: '208'}
{2: 'I am an undeniable "fool."', 3: '209'}
{2: "And I don't need such a cheap form of happiness.", 3: '212'}
{2: 'I only do what I believe is right.', 3: '213'}
{1: '1', 2: 'α', 3: "I've said it many times, you're just a coward who refuses to confront others.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'α', 3: "Everything you're trying to build is just plain worthless.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'King', 3: "Are you denying your own sister's hopes?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'King', 3: 'You know what awaits her once she leaves here.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'King', 3: "There, you can't protect her indefinitely, but here, you can.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'King', 3: "It's not a choice. If you reject my proposal, your existence will truly become meaningless.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'α', 3: "...Even so, I won't let Luna stay in this prison woven by herself.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'α', 3: "This isn't a choice either.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'King', 3: 'So, what can you do now?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'King', 3: 'My "Queen" has ascended the throne, and my "Knight" stands guard at the finish line.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'King', 3: "She's out of the game, I've achieved the result I desired.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'King', 3: 'Only a minor "Pawn" remains, what can it possibly accomplish?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'I still have other pieces to play besides her.', 3: '235'}
{3: 'On the scoreboard mar"King" the number of dice, a golden dice symbol lights up.'}
{3: 'That is the final event reward for BLACK★ROCK SHOOTER, a special dice that could grant an extra dice to any piece.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'King', 3: "Even if you use it on a piece that's been taken out, it'll only return to the start.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'King', 3: 'Bishop, "Knight", "Queen"... reviving any of them is futile; they can\'t possibly reach the finish line.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'α', 3: "It doesn't need to reach the finish line.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'α', 3: 'I fully understand your intention in designating me as a "Rook" and your efforts to keep me out of the game.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'α', 3: 'In chess, the "Rook" is the sword and shield of the "King", both a chariot and a castle.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'α', 3: 'When necessary, the "Rook" will swap places with the "King" to shield it from enemy harm.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'α', 3: "But Luna, as much as I wish to, I can't always be there to protect you.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLouDianNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLouDianNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryShuju.prefab', 2: '1'}
{2: 'King?', 3: 'You promised... you would always...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryShuju.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: 'A golden dice floats before Alpha, lighting up the dim "Rook" on the scoreboard.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxTongyong/FxUiGuanbixiaoshi.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '1', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxTongyong/FxUiGuanbixiaoshi.prefab', 4: '1'}
{2: "Alright, let's play the final round.", 3: '271'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryFanpaizhuanchang01.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryFanpaizhuanchang01.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory818.jpg'}
{3: 'She walks along the final corridor.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory817.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory817.jpg'}
{3: 'At the end of the corridor stands a colossal door, behind which lies the end of the chessboard.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Before the door, a white knight stands in silence.'}
{3: 'With the sword covered in cracks and frosted with bits of ice, the knight is surrounded by ice yet to melt.'}
{3: 'Fida recognizes these are signs of battle left by the girl named Lucia.'}
{2: 'Knight', 3: "...It's been a while, Fida.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Fida', 3: 'What in the world is going on... Melaka?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Knight', 3: 'I need to stop you here.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Fida', 3: 'I... I still have so many questions for you.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Knight', 3: "...I'm sorry, but I can no longer answer them.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Fida', 3: 'Is this our... inevitable fate?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Knight', 3: 'This is not fate.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Knight', 3: 'We exist in a constant state of desiring to harm others, no matter when, no matter where.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Knight', 3: 'This is the outcome we all anticipated.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Knight', 3: 'Draw your sword, Fida.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab', 2: '2', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Knight', 3: "You can't run away this time.", 4: '1'}
